title: Elon Musk hits out at Britain after reported summit snub
description: Elon Musk criticized Britain after reports that he was not invited to an investment summit due to his social media posts about recent anti-immigration riots. Musk alleged the UK government was releasing convicted paedophiles while imprisoning people for social media posts. The Labour government aims to attract investors at the upcoming summit.
content: Elon Musk hit back at Britain on Thursday after reports that he had not been invited to the country's upcoming investment summit, alleging the government was releasing convicted paedophiles while imprisoning people over social media posts.
